strings.registerSubHeader: Staff, members and volunteers of the Red Cross Red Crescent Movement (National Societies, the IFRC and the ICRC) are welcome to register for a user account on GO, to access information for the Membership. Other responders and members of the public may browse the public areas of the site without registering for an account.
strings.registrationFailure: Sorry could not register new user right now!
strings.registerJustify: It appears you do not have an official Red Cross Red Crescent email, we will need to verify your status. Please note, this may take some time.
